meanings.sent1: The rambunctious puppy kept jumping around the room.
meanings.sent2: The children were always rambunctious during recess.
meanings.sent3: The rambunctious party guests danced wildly to the music.
meanings.sent4: The storm was as rambunctious as a toddler throwing a tantrum.
meanings.sent5: Her laughter was as rambunctious as a roaring waterfall.

meanings.sent1: The rambunctious horse refused to stay still for the farrier.
meanings.sent2: The toddler was too rambunctious for his tired parents to handle.
meanings.sent3: The rambunctious kitten kept knocking things off the table.
meanings.sent4: The wind was as rambunctious as a mischievous child playing pranks.
meanings.sent5: The river was as rambunctious as a wild stallion running free.
